All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AsyncRule
A specialized Rule that supports asynchronous validation via CompletableFuture.
BeanCreationException
Exception thrown when a bean cannot be created in the dependency injection system.
BeanNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a requested bean is not found in the dependency injection system.
BeanScope
Enum representing the scope of a bean.
BodyPublisherFunction
Functional interface that represents a function for modifying an HttpRequest.Builder with a given HttpRequest.BodyPublisher.
CircularDependencyException
Exception thrown when a circular dependency is detected in the dependency injection system.
ConfigLoader
Loads and manages configuration properties for the application.
ConfigurationManager
A singleton class that manages application configuration.
ConfigurationType
Enum representing the configuration type of a bean.
CookieBuilder
Builds and adds Cookie objects to an HttpServletResponse.
CookieConfiguration
Provides configuration for cookies, including names, paths, and policies.
CorsConfiguration
Configuration class for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) settings.
CorsFilter
A filter that enforces Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) rules.
Cryptography
Utility class for cryptographic operations, primarily focused on generating secure random values in various formats.
DatabaseConfig
Represents the configuration settings for a database connection.
DefaultCookieConfiguration
Provides a default cookie configuration that is automatically loaded.
DefaultFilterConfiguration
Provides the default filter configuration for the Jolt framework.
DefaultGlobalExceptionHandler
Provides a default mechanism for handling exceptions in a Jolt-based application.
DefaultSecurityConfiguration
Default implementation of the SecurityConfiguration.
DuplicateRouteException
Exception thrown when a duplicate route is detected in the routing system.
FailedToBuildBodyException
Exception thrown when the body of a request or response cannot be built.
FieldValidator
A class that encapsulates validation logic for a single form field.
FilterConfiguration
Defines an abstract configuration mechanism for filters within the Jolt framework.
Form
A container for form fields, field values, and their associated validators.
FormConversionException
Exception thrown when a form value cannot be converted to the expected type.
FormException
Exception thrown when a form fails validation.
FrameOptionsPolicy
Defines policies for the X-Frame-Options HTTP header.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Defines an interface for handling unhandled exceptions in Jolt.
HeadersConfiguration
Provides configuration for HTTP security headers including XSS protection, frame options, HSTS, referrer policy, and Content Security Policy (CSP).
HstsPolicy
Defines policies for the Strict-Transport-Security (HSTS) HTTP header.
Http
A utility class that provides static factory methods for creating HTTP requests using the RequestBuilder.
HttpMethod
An enumeration representing the standard HTTP methods used in web requests.
HttpStatus
Represents common HTTP status codes, each with a numeric code and descriptive reason phrase.
HttpStatus.StatusCategory
A categorization of HTTP status codes, indicating the general type of response.
InitializationMode
Enum representing the initialization mode of a bean.
JoltApplication
An abstract base class for a Jolt application that sets up logging and initializes the IoC container.
JoltBadRequestException
Exception thrown for HTTP 400 Bad Request errors.
JoltBean
Annotation to mark a class as a bean to be managed by the JoltContainer.
JoltBeanInjection
Annotation used to mark fields for dependency injection.
JoltConfiguration
Annotation to mark a configuration class.
JoltContainer
The JoltContainer class serves as a lightweight dependency injection container.
JoltDIException
Base exception for dependency injection-related errors in the Jolt framework.
JoltDispatcherServlet
The main servlet responsible for dispatching HTTP requests to the appropriate route handler in a Jolt-based application.
JoltException
General-purpose exception for errors in the Jolt framework.
JoltFile
Represents an uploaded file stored in memory.
JoltFilter
Serves as a base class for Jolt filters, implementing the standard Jakarta Servlet Filter interface.
JoltHttpContext
Provides an HTTP context object that encapsulates request and response handling within the Jolt framework.
JoltHttpContextValue
An abstract base class representing a context-dependent value, such as a path parameter or query parameter.
JoltHttpException
Base exception for HTTP-related errors in the Jolt framework.
JoltNotFoundException
Exception thrown for HTTP 404 Not Found errors.
JoltRoutingException
Exception thrown when a routing error occurs in the Jolt framework.
LifecycleEntry
Represents an entry in the HTTP request/response lifecycle.
LogConfigurator
Configures the logging system for the Jolt framework.
LogFormatter
Custom log formatter for the Jolt framework that provides a consistent, clean logging format.
LoggingConfigurationException
Exception thrown when the Jolt logging system fails to initialize or configure properly.
LogInitializer
Automatically initializes the Jolt logging system when the servlet context is created.
MimeInterpreter
Enum representing various MIME types and their associated file extensions.
PathContextValue
A specialized JoltHttpContextValue representing a path parameter.
QueryContextValue
A specialized JoltHttpContextValue for query parameters.
ReferrerPolicy
Defines policies for the Referrer-Policy HTTP header.
RequestBuilder
A builder class for constructing and executing HTTP requests using Java's HttpClient.
Response
Represents an HTTP response received from a request made via RequestBuilder.
Route
Represents a single route in the Jolt framework, pairing an HTTP method and a path pattern to a RouteHandler.
RouteHandler
A functional interface representing a handler for a matched route.
RouteMatch
A record holding information about a matched route, including: The Route that was matched. The Matcher object containing the pattern match results, which can be used to extract path parameters.
Router
Manages and matches routes against HTTP method/path patterns within a Jolt application.
Rule
Represents a general validation rule for form fields.
SecureHeadersFilter
Applies various security-related HTTP response headers.
SecurityConfiguration
Abstract base class for security configurations in Jolt applications.
ServerConfig
Represents the configuration settings for the server.
ServerConfig.Builder
Builder class for constructing ServerConfig instances.
ServerException
Exception thrown for general server-side errors.
StartupLog
Displays a stylized startup banner for Jolt applications.
TomcatServer
 
XssProtectionPolicy
Defines policies for the X-XSS-Protection HTTP header.
